Language.Text: The Sung have established a base near the Huari temple. Your mission is to destroy it.

"The Sung have established a base in this system, and once they build up their forces they will destroy us. Our only chance is to strike them now, before they are ready. Your dream spoke of battle; now is your chance!"
"We will send a Hurin destroyer with you. Strike the Sung with your mighty weapons and make them regret ever finding this refuge!"
"We will send %escortCount% Hurin destroyers with you. Strike the Sung base and drive the invaders back to the darkness whence they came"
"Good luck to you and to us all. May the blessings of the Light fill our worlds again."

Apotamo talks to you:
"The Sung base casts a shadow over everything we have here. We will never be safe until it is destroyed."
"Your failure is also our doom. Maybe we were never meant to bask in the Light's blessings; maybe the darkness of space will consume us after all."

Apotamo greets you as you enter.
"Thank you! You have given us new hope! Despite their great technology, the Sung are not invincible. I wish you could stay with us and help us to defeat them, but I know your path lies among the stars."
